roleset.name: the characteristic sound of a horse; neigh
roleset.note: WHINNY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'whinny' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 38.frame by Perryn (from whinny.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Mr. Ed (because otherwise he wouldn't whinny, he would just talk)
example.text: Mr. Ed whinnied to clear his throat.
